attributes.action: More funding for Stoke-on-Trent schools to give all pupils better trips.
attributes.additional_details: Pupils in Stoke-on-Trent often have fewer opportunities for trips compared to other areas like Durham. More funding would allow schools to offer trips to cities or countries, giving all students the chance to learn, experience new cultures, see how others live, and create memorable educational experiences.
attributes.background: We call on the Government to provide more funding so Stoke-on-Trent schools can make trips to other cities or countries more available, giving all pupils the chance to benefit from enriching educational experiences beyond their local area giving all pupils the chance to experience beyond their area.

rejection.details:
We have to reject petitions that call for action at a local level.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
